displayed_text: Family Member: We’re good. Patient: Um hum. Doctor: Any questions? Family Member: Questions? Patient: Um, do I need any medication? Family Member: No. She gave you the Promax. In a couple of weeks, you’ll need some more pain pills. Patient: Oh, okay. Family Member: Okay? Doctor: Okay. So should I give you a script today is what I’m thinking? Family Member: Yeah. Doctor: Because uh that way you don’t have to scramble last minute. Doctor: What is he on? The Norco, right?
